channel.title: Recreational Poker with Scott Jensen
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/
channel.description: "Recreational Poker with Scott Jensen" focuses on topics of interest to the recreational poker player who normally plays online poker during the evening and on weekends as well as might spend a vacation at a brick-n-motar casino and/or cruiseship to play in their poker room. This show isn't for the poker professional, wannabe poker pro, or those with gambling problems. If you see an episode title with "(idea proposal)" in its title, Scott is tossing one of his ideas he has for making poker better for the recreational poker player. If you see "review" in the episode title, it means Scott has played at their poker site or casino poker room, read their blog or book, or used their software and is now giving you his take on them. If you see "roundtable" in the episode title, it means Scott is holding a roundtable discussion on a topic that would be of interest to the recreational poker player. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:author: Scott_Jensen
channel.itunes:subtitle: Recreational Poker with Scott Jensen

item.title: Charter jets and poker vacations (idea proposal)
item.author: stj@nonesuch.org
item.description: This is an idea proposal where Scott tosses out the idea on why and how casinos and charter jet companies should team up together to sell charter jet service to vacationing poker players.

item.title: Female boycott of women-only poker tournaments (idea proposal)
item.author: stj@nonesuch.org
item.description: Scott tosses out the idea that self-respecting women should not participate in women-only poker tournaments and why doing so hurts the image of women in the poker world.

item.title: Libertarian Party and poker sites (idea proposal)
item.author: stj@nonesuch.org
item.description: Scott tosses out the idea that the Libertarian Party USA can be poker sites' champion in the US political arena, why the LP is suited for this role, why poker sites need it, and how poker sites can make the LP into a strong champion.
item.itunes:author: Scott_Jensen
item.itunes:subtitle: Libertarian Party and poker sites (idea proposal)
item.itunes:summary: Scott tosses out the idea that the Libertarian Party USA can be poker sites' champion in the US political arena, why the LP is suited for this role, why poker sites need it, and how poker sites can make the LP into a strong champion.
